document_data.name: Translocation Trick
document_data.mainbody: '''''Translocation trick''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s and [[sorcerer]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to switch locations and change appearances with a target creature of similar size with the caster. The disguise held until the spell expired, at which point the caster and target changed positions and appearances back to normal.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] components to cast.
